To use this application you must check that it can operate in sleep mode.

To work properly on devices from some manufacturer like Huawei, Mi and etc. Application must be registered as accessibility service. If you have device frome on of sach brand, or app didn't work after reboot, you mast enable Simple SMS Locator accessibility service.

On some devices form Huawei, OnePlus, Mi and etc OS prevent apps from starting up their services automatically on boot complete. To avoid it bug we need registered and enable accessibility service. \n Full explanation of this trick can be found here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41524459/broadcast-receiver-not-working-after-device-reboot-in-android/41627296
